detailsSection:
The Internet Safety Toolkit teaches employees how to protect company information, customer information, and their own personal information. Printed copies of the resources are available upon request from saferweb@microsoft.com. 


•Quiz: Test Your Internet Safety IQ - Printable 10-question quiz.
detailsSection_file_name: US Chamber_Internet Safety at Work_All files.zip
Top Tips for Internet Safety at Work Card.pdf
Test Your Internet Safety IQ Quiz.pdf
installInstructionSection:
Internet safety toolkit resources: 

•Internet Safety Toolkit Instructions  - Understand the resources provided in the toolkit. 

•Internet Safety at Work PowerPoint presentation  - 20 slide presentation with speaker notes. 

•Tip Cards: Top Tips for Internet Safety at Work - Presentation information condensed into a printable double-sided card. 

•Videos: "Stay Sharp on Internet Safety at Work" - Presentation information condensed into a three-minute video. 

•Quiz: Test Your Internet Safety IQ 
Printable 10-question quiz. Available in multiple languages.
